If you have the codeword Defend, immediately.
If not, read on.
‘What are you doing back here,’ asks Grieve Marlock, angrily. ‘You should be defending the citadel! You know, that castle in the Pass of Eagles, up north! Get back there and talk to Orin Telana!’

If you have a coded missive, .
Otherwise, you are shown out in short order. .
